com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.services

Class JpaClusterPersistenceServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.netflix.genie.web.jpa.services.JpaClusterPersistenceServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClusterPersistenceService

    @Transactional(rollbackFor={GenieException.class,GenieRuntimeException.class,javax.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class})
public class JpaClusterPersistenceServiceImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClusterPersistenceService
    Implementation of the ClusterPersistenceService interface using JPA.

      Default constructor.
